div.div: WHERE DO TROLLS GO WHEN THEY DIE?

div.a: How Hugo Chavez Masterfully Trolled The Entire World

div.div: Venezuela has lost its strongman. The world has lost one of its most prolific trolls.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13Fyonf&via=Digg&text=How Hugo Chavez Masterfully Trolled The Entire World

div.div: IT'S TESLA VS. EDISON ALL OVER AGAIN

div.a: What Type Of Electricity Should You Use To Electrocute Yourself?

div.div: Have you always wondered if you electrocuted yourself, which type of electricity would hurt more: AC (Alternating Current) or DC (Direct Current)? Wait no more!

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WUuB3N&via=Digg&text=What Type Of Electricity Should You Use To Electrocute Yourself?

div.a: The Battleship That Took Over Union Square

div.div: During World War I, a 200-foot battleship complete with armaments appeared right in the middle of Union Square. It was a massive presence, taking up almost the entire stretch of public ground for three long years. But how did it get there? And where did it go?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZcZVsP&via=Digg&text=The Battleship That Took Over Union Square

div.div: HE'S NOT A PLAYER, HE JUST SCHTUPS A LOT

div.a: How An Orthodox Jew Is Scamming The Pants Off NYC's Women

div.div: "I am alone in my apartment with a man I’ve only recently met, and I realize: if I were a woman, I’d probably have my clothes off by now."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZnNVlY&via=Digg&text=How An Orthodox Jew Is Scamming The Pants Off NYC's Women

div.div: PRINT AND HANG IN YOUR COLLEGE DORM ROOM

div.a: 30 Shots: An Infographic

div.div: Is it an infographic, or a recipe list? Either way, this poster shows what’s inside 30 of the most popular and iconic shooters.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/168GbJW&via=Digg&text=30 Shots: An Infographic

div.div: THAT'S JUST LIKE, YOUR OPINION, MAN

div.a: The Laid-Back World Of 'Big Lebowski' Worship

div.div: A decade and a half after its initial release in cinemas, the Coen brothers' strange cult comedy often gets mined for—and sometimes creates—spiritual meaning.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YcM6q1&via=Digg&text=The Laid-Back World Of 'Big Lebowski' Worship

div.div: AND HE'S REFUSING TO PAY CHILD SUPPORT

div.a: The Father Of All Men Is 340,000 Years Old

div.div: Albert Perry carried a secret in his DNA: a Y chromosome so distinctive that it reveals new information about the origin of our species. It shows that the last common male ancestor down the paternal line of our species is over twice as old as we thought.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XSNYrM&via=Digg&text=The Father Of All Men Is 340,000 Years Old

div.a: Terrifyingly Plausible Ways The Human Race Could Go Extinct That Never Even Occured To You

div.div: The meteorite that exploded in southern Russia last month and the near-miss asteroid that passed by the same week have more than a few of us pondering humanity’s potential extinction. So here are some ways we could all die that you probably haven't thought of yet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13FTPVi&via=Digg&text=Terrifyingly Plausible Ways The Human Race Could Go Extinct That Never Even Occured To You

div.div: THE MOST PRESTIGIOUS DESK OF ALL

div.a: Your Office May Have A Candy Drawer, But The Senate Has A Candy Desk
@stefanjbecket
3h ago

div.div: The Senate keeps one member's desk filled with candy at all times. It's called the Candy Desk.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/wg1Sy&via=Digg&text=Your Office May Have A Candy Drawer, But The Senate Has A Candy Desk

div.a: Beware Of Broken Glass: The Media's Double Standard For Women At The Top

div.div: The press has attacked Facebook's Sheryl Sandberg and Yahoo's Marissa Mayer for being strong, ambitious leaders.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15xzTSZ&via=Digg&text=Beware Of Broken Glass: The Media's Double Standard For Women At The Top

div.a: LEGO Spill Shuts Down Section Of Highway

div.div: Thankfully no one was walking barefoot down the road at the same time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zd9xUc&via=Digg&text=LEGO Spill Shuts Down Section Of Highway

div.a: Help This Woman Find Her Doppelganger

div.div: "I started looking for my doppelganger on 17 November 2011. What started as an idea for a feature - a social experiment to see if I can find my double using the internet, word of mouth and basically any way possible - has since turned me into a woman on a mission."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WHRylb&via=Digg&text=Help This Woman Find Her Doppelganger

div.a: Researchers Finding Unreported Side Effects Of Drugs Using Search Data

div.div: Using data drawn from queries entered into Google, Microsoft and Yahoo search engines, scientists at Microsoft, Stanford and Columbia University have for the first time been able to detect evidence of unreported prescription drug side effects before they were found by the Food and Drug Administration's warning system.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VGmeXK&via=Digg&text=Researchers Finding Unreported Side Effects Of Drugs Using Search Data

div.div: EXCEPT THE DIGG UPDATE, OF COURSE

div.a: The Chipotle App Update Is The Most Important App Update

div.div: If you want to contribute toward the pixelated glory of the species, look away from Foursquare, Uber, Snapchat, Temple Run, "Path," or whatever the hell else. These are sideshows and baubles. Chipotle's first update since 2009 is why tech matters.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zd4Yt7&via=Digg&text=The Chipotle App Update Is The Most Important App Update

div.a: The Dark Side Of Google Glass

div.div: I've witnessed humanity worship the smartphone, make prevalent voice-controlled navigation and perfect self-mounted, POV digital video cameras, I'm not so sure that Google Glass is going to be good for us as a society.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZqS7S6&via=Digg&text=The Dark Side Of Google Glass

div.a: How Those Medieval Paw Prints Became An Internet Sensation

div.div: Do manuscripts and felines make a good combination, or can this popularity be ascribed to the fact that many contemporary cat owners identify themselves with the unfortunate medieval scribe?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZlLdxo&via=Digg&text=How Those Medieval Paw Prints Became An Internet Sensation

div.div: NO CLEANUP, BUT ALSO NO FUN

div.a: Tweet-To-Shoot Paintball Gun Makes Social Media Messy

div.div: The power of paint is in your hands thanks to Paintbot, a Twitter-activated paintball gun that only requires the right hashtag to make it shoot.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XQlGgu&via=Digg&text=Tweet-To-Shoot Paintball Gun Makes Social Media Messy

div.a: Apple: No, The App Store Is Not A Monopoly

div.div: Apple has urged a U.S. District Court judge to dismiss a lawsuit claiming it has a monopoly over iOS apps, saying it has done no wrong.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14tTl0g&via=Digg&text=Apple: No, The App Store Is Not A Monopoly

div.a: The Man Behind Fox News Revealed

div.div: “My doctor told me that I’m old, fat, and ugly, but none of those things is going to kill me immediately,” he said shortly before his 72nd birthday. “The actuaries say I have six to eight years. The best tables give me 10. Three thousand days, more or less.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WP2NxK&via=Digg&text=The Man Behind Fox News Revealed

div.div: BUMS ON THE STAGE GET BUMS IN THE SEATS

div.a: Actors Reveal All On Stage Nudity

div.div: Actors have been shedding their clothes on stage for decades. But just what are the challenges of revealing all in front of an audience?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZeXhPz&via=Digg&text=Actors Reveal All On Stage Nudity

div.a: Facebook Is Revamping Your Newsfeed Again

div.div: Facebook has a plan to give us something different to look at starting March 7th. If the “new look” for the news feed that it’s unveiling works, it could get us spending more hours on Facebook and seeing more — and more intense — ads.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W3JNZB&via=Digg&text=Facebook Is Revamping Your Newsfeed Again

div.a: Who Gets Rich When You Buy Stuff?

div.div: Hundreds of billionaires make their fortunes selling consumers apparel, toys, food or electronics. See who's getting richer when you buy your favorite brands.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W3oyqF&via=Digg&text=Who Gets Rich When You Buy Stuff?

div.div: THE OTHER HALF OF THE DOLLAR

div.a: Hit-And-Run Suspect Killed The Original 50 Cent

div.div: Julio Acevedo, wanted in the deaths of a young Brooklyn couple and their unborn baby, says he fled because he was ‘scared’—perhaps because of his earlier killing of the legendary, original 50 Cent.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z9EybR&via=Digg&text=Hit-And-Run Suspect Killed The Original 50 Cent

div.a: This Ends A Lot Better Than You'd Expect

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/168wZVT&via=Digg&text=This Ends A Lot Better Than You'd Expect

div.a: Meet Some Of Japan's Stupidest Twitter Users

div.div: Twitter sure is fun. It's a great way to get information and communicate with others. It's also a platform for people to be really, really stupid.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12tCgZe&via=Digg&text=Meet Some Of Japan's Stupidest Twitter Users
